title: Would you get a burger tattoo for free burgers for a year?
body: CLOVIS, Calif. () — If you’ve ever wanted to win free burgers for a year, then now’s your chance!Southern California-based Farmer Boys is known for its award-winning burgers and is commemorating its 40th anniversary in a special way. Dedicated Farmer Boys fans can get inked and receive free Farmer Boys burgers for a year.Farmer Boys has partnered with tattoo shops in Los Angeles or Las Vegas and those interested can submit their permanent tattoo requests by  by May 21 to be eligible and set an appointment.Tattoos Appointments will take place at  8424 W Santa Monica Blvd West Hollywood and  3000 Paradise Rd, inside Westgate Resort/Casino Las Vegas, Nevada.Farmer Boys enthusiasts can choose from three permanent color designs shown above measuring 2 inches by 2 inches.Farmer Boys  in Clovis, Hanford, Merced, Modesto, Turlock, Bakersfield, and throughout the state.
